places_with_reviews.name: Sri Saravana Bhavan
address: 185, Sholingur Rd, Near Old Bus Stand, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text: Nice place for dining with family and friends. Best place around this area in arrakonam. Hygenic atmosphere and tasty food. Although food is costly but it doesn't compromise on taste. Overall a nice place.

One of the finest places for a veg hotel at akm

Food quality is best

Neet maintenance with hygienic....

Service people must improve their speed of service with patience smiley welcome
Good ambience neat and clean Dining and Kitchen  Night kuda 11.00 varaiku eruku

Had been to this hotel for breakfast and lunch during our visit to Sholingur temple.

Tried idli, Dosa and poori items by us.  It was good and chutney was little spicy.    While returning tried lunch as well.  It's a typical Tamilian meals and overall it was good.  Service was also good and the waiter serviced us based on our needs.

Meals cost was Rs. 70/- only.  Overall value for money.

Very tasty breakfast items available, very good service.
Ghee roast and Vada are very good.
Situated near Karpagam theatre junction and ESI.
The road is very crowded and has frequent traffic jams.

places_with_reviews.name: Ambari Square - Party Hall and Rooms
address: S3B, near Indira Gandhi Statue, Tamil Nadu Housing Board, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631003, India

reviews.text:
Had a good & peaceful stay in Ambari Square.
Recommended for all set of people.
Will revisit again.
Price is little bit higher for single person.
Rooms are neat and clean
AC & Heater & Wardrobe is available.
Smart TV available but no set top box. Only OTT.
Yellow light in the room and no white light.

VERY SUPERB
PARTY HALL VERY VERY SUPERB
DECORATIONS ALL GOOD
THEY MAINTAINING ROOMS AND PARTY HALL VERY GOOD
ALL WORTHY THINGS VERY WORTHY EXPENSE UPTO MY EXPERIENCE.
AMBARI SQUARE COMPETETING CHENNAI BASSED HOTELS, ROOMS AND PARTY HALL..
EVEN THEY DONT HAVE RESTAURANT THEIR ASSISTANCE IS VERY HUMBLE AND MAKING GUEST TO BE HAPPY WITH THEIR ROOM SERVICE..
ALL ROOMS IN DIFFERENT COLORS AND EACH AND EVERY THING DECORATED AND THEIR COMPLIMENTS WHICH THEY GIVING IS SIMPLY SUPERB AND ESSENTIAL |
LIGHTS AND DECORATIONS WERE VERY GOOD

Ambari square one of the best party hall in our arakkonam. I suggest all the best for the best hospitality services and good services. I will refer to My friends and relations for any other functions to ambari square.
Managers Varun and satyan congrats to them.
Thanks and regards
Nice party hall and staff coordination is Superb keep it up mr varun and sathya
One of the best party hall in surrounding and best staff service I have ever seen thank you -varun bro for good assistance

places_with_reviews.name: SRN RESIDENCY
address: INDRA GANDHI STATUE POINT, 7/15A, Kalyana Mandapam St, JOTHI NAGAR, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631003, India

reviews.text: They insist on the full money to be paid in advance They switch off the lift once theirrvworking hours are done. The bedsheets are torn

Rooms are very average. They don't change Bed sheets everyday . They don't clean the room everyday until we ask them.

Atleast , they don't provide water bottle also. Only water can is available near the lift for all the persons.

AC in the room doesn't work properly. Bathroom is not neatly maintained. Hot water not available.

They don't provide Breakfast also.
Had a good stay with family. Only issue is the rooms are located at 2 Nd floor and no lift is available
Don’t ever go this room for stay… Had worst ever experience while staying in this hotel
A new building. Good place to stay. Very clean. Nice behaviour. Cost effective

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel New Sairam
address: 5/100, Mosque St, Arakkonam, Vellore, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text:
Taste is Good.
Waiting time is less
Decent vegetarian hotel near Railway station.
Prices are average.
Road side parking only.
Tasty food, staffs are very kind.. hygiene place.....
Not good hotel members behavior.

This morning, I was having a connecting train at 7:05 at Arakkonam, thought to complete breakfast in the waiting time, this hotel served us hot breakfast with nice Vada, courteous staff, Good place to visit. I'LL recommend it to my friends and family.
A Decent Pure Veg Hotel near Railway station. Good Taste and Quality. Breakfast & Dinner are fresh and special.

places_with_reviews.name: OYO 40129 Ssm Lodge
address: 1, Naidu Complex, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text: Well maintained rooms... neat and clean bathroom. Room is so good with all needed amenities for the price. Easy to locate the place. People who travel from outside need to be aware that there 2 SSM lodges available in the same city. So make sure you are choosing the right location in the google map. Congrats to the SSM Lodge management for maintaining the premises very neat.
Nice Place to Stay. it  is in main Place.oppsite veg hotel operate up to.10 30 PM .easy to reach thiruthani ,Nemli Bala and Soliingur  attached opposite Hotel in photo...
Nice and well maintained rooms... Polite and friendly staffs... Had a great night... ✌😃
Rooms and bathroom is Good, a/c is not effective. Staff support is excellent.
Oww very nice service place

places_with_reviews.name: OYO Vijay Palace

places_with_reviews.name: Arabian Grillz
address: No 6/1 gandhi road stuartpet, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text: Ambience is good, doesn't have a great parking. Food was great, had the takeout packaging was good. Had their shawarma and tandoori chicken both were delicious. Must try as they have a variety of foods

Serving not good
I order chicken fried rice... They are small bowl and they not give gravie & rietha..

Worst ever I had in akm. I bought mini combo pack includes biriyani chicken rice grill and a drink. Biriyani tastes like tomato rice and there is no chicken in chicken fried rice except rice there is nothing else left in it. Taste is horrible the quantity is lil too.

Great to have such type of restaurant in arakonam

They are really maintained good and surving receiving

Food quality is good have a nice place to take
Excellent food and Ambience. We tried first time shawarma in Arakkonam it was perfectly marinated and we enjoyed the flavour. I would recommend everyone must try.
